text: Hey everyone :wave:  we added a minor version (v1.4) for boilerplate (<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/releases/tag/v1.4.0>) which includes the HubDB template <@U3T21PDBK> created and GitHub portal ID secret <@U013TUP19PS> added. Thank you both for the contributions :thankyou:. We also created a project board for version 1.5 here (<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/projects/5>) with the goal of addressing some Google Lighthouse suggestions we are seeing on the boilerplate demo site.
Hi Jason, is there more information about the HubDB template somewhere?

Hey Andreas :wave:  yes if you check out the first link about the release for v1.4 above we should have release notes on each update in the new version with links to each. The HubDB one should be the first update listed under "Feature Enhancements".
ah sorry, i missed that, thanks!
